#summary Version history of releases
=== IPT 1.0 RC2 - SNAPSHOT ===
 * delete freshly added mapping bug fixed
 * more explanations on source files, dwc 
 * try to auto-detect headers in source files

== IPT 1.0 RC1 ==
 * GBIF registry integration
 * zipped source file upload
 * new property mapping UI 
   * dynamically load required vocabularies
   * dynamically add the properties
 * Geoserver 1.7.2 with geowebcache
 * support checklists supplied with flat taxonomic dwc hierarchies 

=== IPT 1.0b4 ===
 * show resource and record annotations
 * allow source link templates that take an ID parameter
 * Fixed bugs:
   * Issue59 fixed delete source bug
   * Issue61, Issue57 


=== IPT 1.0 beta ===
files: [http://gbif-providertoolkit.googlecode.com/files/ipt-1.0beta.war ipt.war] [http://kiwaia.gbif.org/ipt/IPT-1.0beta_geoserver.zip geoserver.zip]
 * Metadata portal
   * fulltext search across all resource metadata
   * geospatial bounding box search with map
   * keyword cloud and alphabetical index
   * visualise all metadata as EML and also as single HTML page
 * bug fixes
   * fixed absolute links to use s:url
   * warn users without javascript
 * TAPIR intermediate support for a fixed DarwinCore output model
   * filters for searches & inventories on all core properties
   * multiple property inventories supported
   * KVP requests only (no xml)
 * uploads refactored towards simpler uploading classes
 * Taxonomic Checklist support
   * basic checklist upload implemented
   * refactored existing occurrence upload to share common routines
   * refactored manager configuration UI to work with both, occurrences and checklist resources
   * checklist webapp for browsing & stats of checklists
   * TCS serialisation for single taxa (archive for entire datasets coming)
 * Resource Configuration UI
   * auto column mapping for new mappings based on column/property names
   * term transformation added to map source values to other values/controlled terms, e.g. "Deutschland" -> "DE"

=== IPT 0.5.1 ===
 * uses XStream for EML metadata persistency
 * bug fixes in config UI

=== IPT 0.5 ===
 * uses embedded H2 database
 * geoserver plugin updated for geotools 2.5 and H2
 * geoserver feature types are updated by the IPT when occurrence resources are changed
 * new manager config UI
 * extension entities visualised
 * metadata browse mockup
 * resource type property added to metadata
 * taxon & region trees open corresponding node in taxon & region overview page

=== IPT 0.4 ===
 * google maps integrated
 * simple EML metadata forms
 * eml output
 * provider settings UI
 * improved occurrence webapp

=== IPT 0.3 ===
 * occurrence webapp added
 * taxon & region trees implemented
 * rss feeds

=== IPT 0.2 ===
 * nested set created for taxonomy & region hierarchy
 * upload/import tasks
